title: ☑️ Prevent containers from accessing host files by using high UIDs
description: It's recommended for containers to run under UIDs that are not used on the host system. With a high UID number, a container is blocked from accessing host-based files even if it manages to gain access to a host's file system.

frontMatter.title: ☑️ Prevent containers from accessing host files by using high UIDs
